act_info.full_title: Ticket Speculation Act, R.S.O. 1990, c. T.7

content.section_y: purchasing as a speculation or at a higher price than advertised
content.content: is guilty of an offence and on conviction is liable to a fine of not more than $5,000.  R.S.O. 1990, c. T.7, s. 2.
content.raw_html: is guilty of an offence and on conviction is liable to a fine of not more than $5,000.  R.S.O. 1990, c. T.7, s. 2.
